Model.Game

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Game.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the location of a Tile on the board. It has a unique X and Y coordinate combination. Created by Martijn on 11-1-2016.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int x
      This Location's X coordinate.
      private int y
      This Location's Y coordinate.

      Creates a new instance of a Locations with an X and a Y coordinate.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(int x,
             int y)
        Checks whether a given X and Y are equal to this Location's X and Y.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate to be tested.
        y - Y coordinate to be tested.
        Returns:
        True if X and Y are equal to this.x and this.y respectively.
